original_text:
Cazino Cosmos
Cazino Cosmos è una 5 oscillazione, 20 slot payline da Yggdrasil Gaming che La vede unirsi a Stella matriarca nella Via Lattea. Il seguito di Cazino Zeppelin, è dotato di una funzione Free Spins dove tutti i selvaggi diventano appiccicosi. Si tratta principalmente della funzione Collections Free Spins, in cui si gioca in 1 delle 5 modalità di giri gratis, ognuna delle quali offre cose diverse – ti danno più giri gratis, più giri appiccicosi, più giri gratis, giri selvaggi, doppi giri impilati o trasformazioni selvagge. Ci sono 11.821 volte la tua posta in gioco da vincere!
Una grafica spaziale
Cazino Cosmos Slot, sotto la stretta regola della sua formidabile matriarca Stella, fluttua nello spazio ed è il luogo dove i più grandi giocatori dell’Universo vanno testa a testa per alcune vittorie cosmiche. Il gioco fa seguito a uno degli artisti di lunga data di Yggdrasil, Cazino Zeppelin. Ma Cazino Cosmos prende la meccanica di base del gioco originale di Sticky Wilds in Free Spins e lo invia nell’iperspazio con l’aggiunta di collezioni. Ogni bobina ha i propri simboli wild collezionabili e il completamento di ogni collezione vi porterà a separare i Free Spins con l’aggiunta di wilds, extra free spins, wild nudges, stacked wilds o conversioni wild.
Yggdrasil si è impegnato a fondo sulla slot Cazino Cosmos per mantenere il tema steampunk, con un set di bobine guidate dal motore e nuovi personaggi che popolano le bobine. I personaggi di Cazino Zeppelin sono stati sostituiti da un gruppo di futuristici esploratori spaziali che stanno sfrecciando nell’iperspazio in un mondo futuro molto lontano. Stella è l’eroina steampunk e leader del gruppo, che si presenta come il simbolo selvaggio del gioco.
All’interno dell’astronave è stata allestita un’intricata finestra di gioco con una serie di controlli e cinque display per le caratteristiche da collezione che svettano su di essa. Una misteriosa colonna sonora accompagna l’azione sui rulli ed è interrotta solo dal solito conteggio delle vittorie e dai rumori di dispersione.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Cazino Cosmos è alimentato da Yggdrasil Gaming e viene fornito con 5 rulli e 20 linee di pagamento. Giocabile da 10p a 20 sterline a rotazione su dispositivi desktop, mobili e tablet (inclusi iOS e Android), è il seguito del popolare slot Cazino Zeppelin. Ambientato nello spazio, si unisce alla formidabile matriarca Stella in una missione per le vittorie cosmiche.
Visivamente, Cazino Cosmos è superbo e ha un’atmosfera space/steampunk – ambientato con un’astronave e con una misteriosa colonna sonora, i simboli sui rulli includono mazze, cuori, picche e diamanti così come gli alieni Catman, Hatman e Wineman. Il generale barbuto è il simbolo più gratificante che ti dà 200 volte la tua puntata per 5 su una linea di pagamento. Matriarca Stella è il simbolo jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli regolari (che significa niente spargimento).
Ora, Cazino Cosmos è dotato di una funzione Collections Free Spins – ogni bobina ha il suo simbolo wild da collezione. Se si raccolgono 5 wilds su una singola bobina, si innescherà la Collezione di giri gratis. Questo è lo stesso della funzione Free Spins, ma inizia con una funzione wild o con giri extra gratuiti. Ecco cosa dovete sapere su ogni bobina:

Rotolo 1 – Giri liberi con il colpo di carta: All’inizio vengono aggiunti 2 wilds casuali e appiccicosi – si gioca con 10 giri gratis.
Reel 2 – Hack Free Spins: 5 giri gratis extra vengono aggiunti ai 10 giri gratis iniziali.
Reel 3 – Zero Gravity Free Spins – ogni bobina può essere spinta verso l’alto o verso il basso se c’è un wild che può entrare in gioco.
Reel 4 – Mutation Free Spins – viene scelto un simbolo ad alto valore casuale per ogni giro libero. Tutte le istanze di quel simbolo avranno la possibilità di trasformarsi in un wild che poi diventa appiccicoso.

Altre Slot Machine simili
Se hai apprezzato questa Slot Machine prodotta da Yggdrasil, devi sapere che è il sequel di un’altra Slot prodotta dallo stesso provider di software per Online Gambling. Ti stiamo parlando di Casino Zeppelin, la Slot prodotta da Yggdrasil che ti permette di vincere fino a 2,000 volte la tua puntata iniziale.

raw_translation.response:
"Cazino Cosmos" is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot game from Yggdrasil Gaming where players join the matriarch Stella in the Milky Way. This sequel to "Cazino Zeppelin" features a Free Spins function where all wilds become sticky. The highlight is the Collections Free Spins feature, where you play in one of five different modes of free spins, each offering unique perks such as more free spins, sticky wilds, wild nudges, stacked wilds, or wild transformations. There are up to 11,821 times your stake to be won!

Set in space, "Cazino Cosmos" has a superb space/steampunk atmosphere, featuring an intricate game window with controls and five displays for the collection features that tower above it. The mysterious soundtrack accompanies the action on the reels, interrupted only by the usual win count and scatter noises.The symbols on the reels include clubs, hearts, spades, diamonds, and aliens Catman, Hatman, and Wineman. Matriarch Stella is the wild symbol and replaces all regular symbols.

Powered by Yggdrasil Gaming, "Cazino Cosmos" can be played from as little as 10p up to £20 per spin on desktop, mobile, and tablet devices (including iOS and Android). If you enjoyed this game, be sure to check out its predecessor, "Cazino Zeppelin," which offers up to 2,000 times your initial stake in winnings. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate the attention to detail and unique features of "Cazino Cosmos," making it a must-play for any avid slot game enthusiast.

response.headline: Cazino Cosmos Takes Slot Gaming to New Heights

Cazino Cosmos is a phenomenal online slot game that promises its players an intergalactic journey through space. This game is a sequel to the renowned Cazino Zeppelin, and Yggdrasil Gaming has taken the steampunk-inspired theme to a whole new level.

If you're looking for a slot game that boasts an otherworldly experience filled with mystery, intricate graphics, and an interesting storyline, then Cazino Cosmos is perfect for you. The slot game is visually stunning, complete with an amazing cast of characters and a soundtrack that'll keep you excited throughout your gameplay.

The game's mechanics are relatively simple, however, there are various bonus features that ramp up the excitement and provide opportunities for huge winnings. The game comes with 20 paylines, 5 reels with a minimum bet of €0.10 and a maximum bet of €20.

Your game-winning strategy will depend on your ability to take advantage of the free spins, sticky wilds, and high-value wilds that come with the game. Additionally, the game's jackpot feature promises a massive payout of 11,821x your bet.

Stella and her team of space outlaws are in search of riches, and you get to lead them on their futuristic adventure. Be warned though, the galaxy can be a dangerous place, so stay alert, and make sure to keep your eyes on the prize.

In conclusion, Cazino Cosmos is a fantastic slot game that'll keep you entertained for hours on end. It's the perfect balance of exceptional graphics, exciting gameplay, and engaging storyline. Give it a shot today, and you could end up winning big while you take an adventure into the unknown!

Cazino Cosmos Slot Game

Cazino Cosmos is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot game from Yggdrasil Gaming that takes place in space and follows the steampunk theme of its predecessor, Cazino Zeppelin.

Gameplay Features

Cazino Cosmos boasts two main features, the Free Spins function and the Collections Free Spins function. In the Free Spins function, all wilds become sticky, increasing your chances of winning. In the Collections Free Spins function, you can play in one of five different free spin modes, each with unique features such as additional wilds, extra free spins, double-stacked spins, and wild transformations. Completing a collection triggers a unique Free Spins feature with additional benefits.

Win Potential

Players have the chance to win up to 11,821 times their stake in Cazino Cosmos. The game offers a variety of ways to win big, including its two main features and collecting wild symbols. Its predecessor, Cazino Zeppelin, offers players the chance to win up to 2,000 times their initial stake.

Visual and Audio Elements

Cazino Cosmos is visually stunning and features a space/steampunk atmosphere, with futuristic symbols and characters such as Catman, Hatman, and Wineman. The game's heroine, Stella, serves as the wild symbol. Each reel has its own collectible wild symbols, and completing a collection triggers a unique Free Spins feature with additional wilds, extra free spins, and more. The intricate game window and mysterious soundtrack add to the overall immersive experience.

Compatibility with Devices

Cazino Cosmos can be played from 10p to 20 pounds per spin on desktop, mobile, or tablet devices. This makes it accessible to a wide range of players, regardless of their preferred device or location.

Review:
 
Gameplay

Cazino Cosmos is a 5-reel, 20-payline slot game that is easy to play and understand. Players join Stella in the Milky Way, and the game has a steampunk space theme similar to its predecessor, Cazino Zeppelin. The game features a Free Spins function where all wilds become sticky, and a Collections Free Spins function where players can play in 1 of 5 different free spin modes, each offering different features. Each reel has its own collectible wild symbols, and completing a collection triggers a unique Free Spins feature with additional wilds, extra free spins, and more.

Free Spins features

One of the main attractions of Cazino Cosmos is its Free Spins features. The first is the basic Free Spins function, where all wilds become sticky. The second is the Collections Free Spins function, where players can play in 1 of 5 different free spin modes, each offering different features. These features include more free spins, sticky spins, wild spins, double stacked spins, or wild transformations. Completing a collection triggers a unique Free Spins feature with additional wilds, extra free spins, and more. These features give players the chance to win big, with up to 11,821 times your stake to be won.

Visuals and Soundtrack

Cazino Cosmos is visually stunning and features a space/steampunk atmosphere. The game has an intricate game window and futuristic symbols on the reels, including characters such as Catman, Hatman, and Wineman, as well as the game's heroine, Stella, who serves as the wild symbol. The game also has a mysterious soundtrack to accompany the action on the reels, adding to the game's overall ambiance.

Compatibility

Players can enjoy Cazino Cosmos from the comfort of their desktop, mobile or tablet device. The game is available to play on all devices, so players can take the game with them wherever they go. The game's interface is optimized for each device, ensuring smooth gameplay no matter how players choose to play.

Win Potential

Players who enjoy high-stakes slot games will appreciate the potential win of up to 11,821 times their initial stake in Cazino Cosmos. The game's Free Spins features give players the chance to win big, with each of the 5 different free spin modes offering different features. Additionally, each reel has its own collectible wild symbols, and completing a collection triggers a unique Free Spins feature with additional wilds, extra free spins, and more. Overall, Cazino Cosmos offers players a chance to win big while enjoying a visually stunning and immersive gaming experience.
